# About this booklet

## About the author
This project is initiated by Duong Pham, a Ph.D. student in Political Science at University of California, San Diego. In this booklet, you will find:

## About the booklet
- Reading lists, annotated bibliographies, as well as essays for a wide array of topics spanning the two political science sub-fields: \textbf{(1) International Relations} and \textbf{(2) Comparative Politics}.
- My notes for matters related to research methodologies, including recommended self-study resources (online courses, videos, webpages, etc.), personal notes for methods classes' lectures, recommended tools, etc.
